RankChannels, RankChannelsAction
public abstract class BaseRankChannels
extends RhnLookupDispatchAction

BaseRankChannels, Abstract class for config channel rankings in ssm and sdc.

setupWidget

protected void setupWidget(RequestContext context,
                           DynaActionForm form,
                           RhnSet set)
Sets up the rangling widget.

Parameters:
context - the request context of the current request
form - the dynaform related to the current request.
set - the rhnset holding the channel ids.

populateWidgetLabels

protected abstract void populateWidgetLabels(java.util.LinkedHashSet labelValues,
                                             RequestContext context)
Extension point for each of the subclasses to add content LabelValues before more content is added to it using rhn sets to the RankWidget check box.. The subclasses should update the labelValues

Parameters:
labelValues - a LinkedHashSet/List in some sense that holds a bunch of lv(Channel labels, Channel ids). This is a Linked Hash Set becasue we needed to throw away duplicate insertions while maintaining the correct order of insertion.
context - the request context of the current request

getChannelIds

protected java.util.List getChannelIds(DynaActionForm form)
Returns the the channel Ids info retrieved after one has clicked Update Channel Rankings or Apply Subscriptions.

Parameters:
form - the submitted form..
Returns:
List containing the channel ids in the order of their new rankings.

getRhnSet

protected RhnSet getRhnSet(User user)
returns the Rhn Set used to store the sets..

Parameters:
user - The Loggin User
Returns:
rhn set used to store channel ids.

                                    ActionForm formIn,

Parameters:
